text:
Kímberly Marie Jiménez de León (born 1996) is a Dominican actress, model and beauty pageant titleholder who was appointed as Miss Universe Dominican Republic 2020 and represented Dominican Republic at Miss Universe 2020.
Early life.
Jiménez works as a model and actress. She is the daughter of a Dominican father and a Puerto Rican mother.
Pageantry.
Jiménez began her pageantry career representing Dorado in the Miss Universe Puerto Rico 2017 competition held at the Centro de Bellas Artes Luis A. Ferré in San Juan, Puerto Rico on May 4, 2017. She placed as the 2nd Runner-up and lost to eventual winner Danna Hernández. Jiménez represented La Romana joined Miss Dominican Republic 2019 pageant held at the Teatro Nacional in Santo Domingo on August 18, 2020 She placed as the 2nd runner-up and lost to eventual winner Clauvid Dály. On September 28, 2020, Jiménez was announced and appointed as Miss República Dominicana Universo 2020.
